entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
